attributes.title: God awful do not download

Me and my family were beyond scared for are lives so we ran out the back. Every one who survived tried to call the police but they were to busy killing black people and getting away with it. And I went back into the app and deleted it and most things went back to normal but me and my family are emotionally scared. And we still havenâ€™t been out to eat since. And if something similar has happened to you or your family members Iâ€™m am so sorry.
